message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
I'm really interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid $15000 is still a bit below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $22000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a great value for this exceptional product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $22000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
